statements: SELECT * FROM FoodRetailers;
SELECT Name, Location FROM FoodRetailers ORDER BY Name DESC;
SELECT * FROM FoodRetailers WHERE Location='New York';
SELECT Name, Type FROM FoodRetailers WHERE Type='Supermarket';
SELECT * FROM FoodRetailers WHERE Rating >= 4;
SELECT * FROM Products WHERE category = 'meat' ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT retailer_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM Orders GROUP BY retailer_name ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;
SELECT AVG(price) AS avg_price, MIN(price) AS min_price, MAX(price) AS max_price FROM Products WHERE category = 'vegetables';
SELECT supplier_name, product_name, price FROM Products p JOIN Suppliers s ON p.supplier_id = s.supplier_id ORDER BY supplier_name ASC, price DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM Orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01' AND order_date <= '2022-12-31' AND total_price > 1000 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Retailers;
SELECT retailer_name, location FROM Retailers WHERE supply_chain_traceability = true;
SELECT retailer_name, location FROM Retailers ORDER BY retailer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Products WHERE organic = true AND certification = 'Fair Trade';
SELECT product_name, certification FROM Products WHERE source_product_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY product_name;
SELECT * FROM Retailers WHERE supply_chain_traceability = TRUE;
SELECT retailer_name, location FROM Retailers WHERE retailer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM Products WHERE product_name LIKE '%organic%' ORDER BY certification DESC;
SELECT product_name, certification, source_product_id FROM Products WHERE organic = TRUE AND certification IS NOT NULL;
SELECT retailer_name, location, product_name, certification FROM Retailers JOIN Products ON Retailers.retailer_id = Products.source_product_id;
SELECT * FROM supply_chain_traceability;
SELECT product_name, manufacturer FROM supply_chain_traceability;
SELECT certification_id, certification_name FROM product_certifications;
SELECT source_name, organic_certification FROM sustainable_sourcing_practices;
SELECT product_name, manufacturer, certification FROM supply_chain_traceability;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM supply_chain_traceability;
SELECT * FROM product_certifications WHERE certification_id = 1;
SELECT manufacturer, product_name FROM supply_chain_traceability ORDER BY manufacturer DESC;
SELECT source_name, certification_status FROM sustainable_sourcing_practices WHERE organic_certification IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM supply_chain_traceability JOIN product_certifications ON supply_chain_traceability.certification = product_certifications.certification_name;
SELECT * FROM FoodRetailers;
SELECT retailer_name, location FROM FoodRetailers WHERE certification_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM Products WHERE organic = TRUE;
SELECT product_name, product_type FROM Products ORDER BY product_type DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM Suppliers WHERE organic_certification_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM FoodRetailers;
SELECT retailer_name, location FROM FoodRetailers WHERE certification_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT retailer_name, location FROM FoodRetailers ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT p.product_name, p.product_type, f.retailer_name FROM Products p JOIN FoodRetailers f ON p.retailer_id = f.retailer_id WHERE p.organic = TRUE;
SELECT s.supplier_name, c.certification_type FROM Suppliers s JOIN Certifications c ON s.organic_certification_id = c.certification_id;
SELECT * FROM Retailers;
SELECT retailer_name, location FROM Retailers;
SELECT * FROM Products WHERE certification = 'N/A';
SELECT product_name, organic FROM Products WHERE retailer_id = 1;
SELECT supplier_name, location FROM Suppliers;
SELECT * FROM Retailers ORDER BY retailer_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, certification, organic FROM Products WHERE organic = true AND certification <> 'N/A';
SELECT supplier_name, SUM(price) AS total_price FROM Suppliers JOIN Product_Suppliers ON Suppliers.supplier_id = Product_Suppliers.supplier_id GROUP BY supplier_name;

SELECT Products.product_name, Retailers.retailer_name, Product_Suppliers.price FROM Products JOIN Product_Suppliers ON Products.product_id = Product_Suppliers.product_id JOIN Retailers ON Products.retailer_id = Retailers.retailer_id WHERE Product_Suppliers.price > 50 ORDER BY Product_Suppliers.price ASC;
SELECT * FROM Sustainable_Practices WHERE description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY practice_name ASC;
